description:
Hiei faces Kuro Momotaro, an opponent with the ability to prevent certain attacks by adapting his body. Hiei’s only chance lies in a dangerous technique that could easily finish his opponent – but at the cost of his own life!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hiei continuă lupta! Foloseşte lovitura dragonului negru!
飛影連戦! 撃て黒龍波!
